amendment.description: Amendment sought to grant deadline extensions if requested by a State or local elected official or a local tribal official.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-261 to grant deadline extensions if requested by a state or local elected official or a local tribal official.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 230 (Roll no. 510).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 230 (Roll no. 510).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gallego.
